meanings.definition: The act of putting something into operation or use.
meanings.sent1: I filled out an application for the job.
meanings.sent2: The application of sunscreen is important to protect your skin from the sun.
meanings.sent3: The robot's application of paint was a bit messy, but it got the job done.
meanings.sent4: Her application of kindness to everyone she meets is truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The application of pressure to the wound helped stop the bleeding.

meanings.definition: A formal request for something, typically in writing.
meanings.sent1: She submitted her application for a scholarship.
meanings.sent2: The application for a building permit was approved after review.
meanings.sent3: His application for extra vacation days was denied by the boss.
meanings.sent4: The application for financial aid opened up new opportunities for her education.
meanings.sent5: The application for a loan was processed quickly by the bank.

meanings.definition: The action of putting something on a surface.
meanings.sent1: The application of paint to the walls transformed the room.
meanings.sent2: The careful application of glue ensured the pieces stuck together.
meanings.sent3: His application of stickers all over his laptop made it look unique.
meanings.sent4: The application of icing on the cake made it look even more delicious.
meanings.sent5: The application of pressure on the wound helped stop the bleeding.

meanings.definition: A computer program designed for a specific task or use.
meanings.sent1: I downloaded a new application for editing photos.
meanings.sent2: The application for tracking expenses helped me manage my budget.
meanings.sent3: The application for playing music crashed unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: Her application for designing logos was well-received by clients.
meanings.sent5: The application for scanning documents made my work much easier.
